welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sudley, where charm and history meet! Get ready to discover our quaint town known for its stunning nature trails, delicious local cuisine, and friendly community. We can't wait for you to explore and enjoy all that Sudley has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for international flights, with airlines such as British Airways, Lufthansa, and Emirates operating out of this terminal.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport handles all domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves as the base for American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the largest terminal and serves a variety of airlines, including Delta, United, and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'DCA Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
